summary: Adds a black space with mannequins and light sources to experiment with your gear and take screenshots.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/2783/unbenannt1yl.png[/img]

Update #2:

- Adjusted lighting
- no more black screen if:
  1. in 3rd person
  2. in 1st person BUT in combat mode (R-sheathe)

Update #1: 

- New Start Image
- New entrance (see screenshot)
- Total lighting overhaul

Things to do:

- Try to fix the black screen bug (fixed - don\'t think I can remove it completely)


Hello dear Nexus Community,

It\'s my first mod and I have some minor mods in work too.

This mod adds a black space with light sources and mannequins. You can use them to preview some armors/clothings. You can also use the light sources to customize your characters without any disturbing background. The entrance is in Whiterun as seen in the 4th screenshot.

I\'m experiencing a bug regarding the lighting. At specific view angles the whole screen turns pitch black. Please report to me how I could fix this.

Please tell me any ideas how to improve this mod, or what you want me to add to it.

Thank you.
author: chrisstian5
